name: Fleet vs The Volcano
description:
Unreal MegaJam 2021 Entry

Help Fleet collect the required number of coins before rising lava fills the cavern. If the lava reaches your most recent spawn point and you get eliminated, it is GAME OVER!!!

This is a one level Platformer / Concept game. I could add a lot more to it but I ran out of time. Let me know what you think!
